description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.sobLlAGQkmWcFBFx]{Magic Hack}

You expand the selection of spells you can cast with the cache capacitor class feature. Add @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.zxecXzHipD4MEoFc]{Comprehend Languages} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.jvJfulZZMmoO3gDs]{Lifting Frame} to the list of spells you can store in your cache capacitor’s first slot. At 12th level, add @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.BrRuThVTv1aNfUKH]{Mental Silence} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.wlvVM7LgOJ7HVCr8]{Personal Gravity} to the list of spells you can store in your cache capacitor’s second slot. At 18th level, add @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.jpx99euQYR6RfQAc]{Dampening Field} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.8PaUEWogypdwP2aO]{Instant Upgrade} to the list of spells you can store in your cache capacitor’s third slot. You must know a spell to store it in your cache capacitor.
